text: Khasanovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Aptrakovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 221 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Meleuz, 6 km from Aptrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Khasanovo, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
